sentences.en: And we must also grapple with the issue of anonymousspeech.
sentences.cn: 我们还必须解决匿名发表言论的问题.

sentences.en: As for himself, he was too tired to grapple fundamentally with the fact.
sentences.cn: 就他自己来说, 他太累了,根本不想去考虑问题的实质.

sentences.en: But the new president's most urgent task will be to grapple with the economic crisis.
sentences.cn: 但是,这位新总统的当务之急将是全力应对眼下这场经济危机.

sentences.en: Companies must grapple with ever - changing markets and regulations, yet IT budgets are being cut.
sentences.cn: 公司必须努力对付不断变化的市场和法规, 另一方面IT预算正在被削减.

sentences.en: He did all he could to grapple with the enemy.
He no longer wishes to grapple furiously with his universe.
sentences.cn: 他已不再愿意同他的环境奋力博斗了.

sentences.en: I seen him grapple four, and knock their heads together - him unarmed.'
sentences.cn: 我曾见他赤手空拳地以一对四, 揪住对手的脑袋相互碰撞.”

sentences.en: If it wins the grapple check , it establishes a hold and can constrict.
sentences.cn: 如果它通过了擒抱鉴定, 它将紧握并能够压缩.

sentences.en: In his current role, Professor Lyons has had to grapple with another financial crisis.
sentences.cn: 作为哈斯商学院的院长,里昂教授必须应对另一场金融危机.

sentences.en: It is with these problems that Europe now has to grapple.
sentences.cn: 欧洲现在必须对付的就是这些问题.

sentences.en: Managers have learned to grapple with networking, artificial intelligence, computer-aided engineering and manufacturing.
sentences.cn: 经理们已经学会了如何应对联网、人工智能、计算机辅助工程和制造。

sentences.en: Pre - 1987 law made an ineffectual effort to grapple with the problem in section 208.
sentences.cn: 1987年以前的法律就竭力解决第208条中的问题,但效果不明显.

sentences.en: The police warned the public that it would be dangerous to grapple with the wanted man, as he was armed.
sentences.cn: 警察当局警告公众，与那个通缉犯格斗是危险的，因为他携带武器。

sentences.en: They will grapple a lack of capacity until It'starts to impede the business.
sentences.cn: 直到电脑能力开始妨碍公司的业务发展,它们才会去解决问题.

sentences.en: When the snipe and the clam grapple , it is the fisherman who profits.
With lightning feint, one after another pair finally seized hold and began to grapple.
sentences.cn: 一对对摔跤手采取声东击西的佯攻手法,使对方猝不及防,终于揪住了对方,开始搏斗起来.

words.tran_cn: 抓东西的人或物；格斗者；手

trans.tran_cn: 抓住，捉牢，搏斗，与…格斗，用铁锚（铁钩）钩住
